CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_content', false, 'bgIYhpjRuV8zbHJE_CfelwKpJ_Td6YuGJwixiek8lmI', 'v3.5.0--PCB541WvEt0Q0PdsirETUTWb4SdNTpyupmWxtLWsF6w', 'S_kUBhF3XUNzg_Bh7JK_qtXgaQ_mMDwl0xQs3DhIEZs'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_content; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_content (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

{\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"  --ds-btn-bg"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," oklab"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},","],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," #"],["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"111827"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},","],["span",{"class":"s0W1g"}," white "],["span",{"class":"sx098"},"10%"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},");\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":11},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"  --ds-btn-bg-active"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sdLwU"}," color-mix"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"("],["span",{"class":"s7ZW3"},"in"],["span",{"class":"s7ZW3"}," oklab"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},","],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," #"],["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"111827"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},","],["span",{"class":"s0W1g"}," white "],["span",{"class":"sx098"},"20%"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},");\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":12},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"}\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":13},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"</"],["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"style"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},">\n"]]]],["h2",{"id":"notes"},"Notes"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Icon slot names are ",["code",{},"start"]," and ",["code",{},"end"]," (direction-aware). If you previously used ",["code",{},"prepend"],"/",["code",{},"append"],", migrate to ",["code",{},"start"],"/",["code",{},"end"],"."],["li",{},"The default size is ",["code",{},"md"],"; default variant is ",["code",{},"solid"],"."],["li",{},"The component prevents click events while ",["code",{},"disabled"]," or ",["code",{},"loading"]," is true."]],["style",{},"html pre.shiki code .sAklC, html code.shiki .sAklC{--shiki-default:#89DDFF}html pre.shiki code .s-wAU, html code.shiki .s-wAU{--shiki-default:#F07178}html pre.shiki code .sJ14y, html code.shiki .sJ14y{--shiki-default:#C792EA}html pre.shiki code .saEQR, html code.shiki .saEQR{--shiki-default:#676E95;--shiki-default-font-style:italic}html pre.shiki code .s6cf3, html code.shiki .s6cf3{--shiki-default:#89DDFF;--shiki-default-font-style:italic}html pre.shiki code .s0W1g, html code.shiki .s0W1g{--shiki-default:#BABED8}html pre.shiki code .sfyAc, html code.shiki (direction‑aware)"},{"id":"disabled-and-loading","depth":2,"text":"Disabled and 'Base Button with variants, t-shirt sizes, start/end icon slots, and accessible defaults.', 'md', '{"order":1}', 'true', '/components/button', '{"title":"Button","description":"Base Button with variants, t-shirt sizes, start/end icon slots, and accessible defaults."}', 'components/button', 'xylfpSWcbLbjzU_j_8FdEXiBJo6r6G0JqygxvkmTl2c'); -- xylfpSWcbLbjzU_j_8FdEXiBJo6r6G0JqygxvkmTl2c
INSERT INTO _content_content VALUES ('content/components/index.md', 'Components', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["h2",{"id":"quick-links"},"Quick links"],["ul",{},["li",{},["a",{"href":"/components/button"},"Button"]]]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":2,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"quick-links","depth":2,"text":"Quick links"}]}}', 'Explore reusable UI components and usage patterns.', 'md', '{"order":1}', 'true', '/components', '{"title":"Components","description":"Explore reusable UI components and usage patterns."}', 'components/index', '6m8Kj8RT_k9GpbkbvFaI9C6P96OBFZxnhPHV1qPKgiU'); -- 6m8Kj8RT_k9GpbkbvFaI9C6P96OBFZxnhPHV1qPKgiU
INSERT INTO _content_content VALUES ('content/docs/design-philosophy.md', 'Design philosophy', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["h2",{"id":"sub-atomic-design-system"},"Sub-atomic design system"],["p",{},"Atomic Design (atoms → molecules → organisms → templates → pages) gave us\nlanguage, but its hierarchy has always been a leaky metaphor. “Templates”\nappearing after “molecules” isn’t coherent in any scientific sense, and it\ndoesn’t scale well as systems become more complex, multi-brand, themable, and\napp-integrated."],["p",{},"This document proposes a Sub-Atomic Design System, drawing a tighter analogy to\nbiology and materials science: particles → atoms → molecules → cells → organs →\norganisms → community. It keeps the spirit of composability while clarifying\nresponsibilities at each level for both design (Figma) and development (code)."],["h2",{"id":"why-the-original-hierarchy-breaks-down"},"Why the original hierarchy breaks down"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Metaphor drift: “Templates” and “pages” describe outputs, not compositional\nconstructs. They break the internal logic of composition."],["li",{},"System complexity: Modern systems require theming, context-awareness,\naccessibility, and data-binding earlier than “page level.”"],["li",{},"Ownership and versioning: Teams need clear boundaries for who owns tokens,\nprimitives, composites, and product-level flows."]],["h2",{"id":"the-sub-atomic-model-at-a-glance"},"The Sub-Atomic model at a glance"],["table",{},["thead",{},["tr",{},["th",{"align":"right"},"Layer"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Purpose"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Figma (design)"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Code (dev)"],["th",{"align":"left"},"Examples"]]],["tbody",{},["tr",{},["td",{"align":"right"},"Particles"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Raw measurable values; no semantics; not reused directly"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Raw values behind tokens (hex, px, ms)"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Constants in config, CSS custom props’ values"],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"#3b82f6"],", ",["code",{},"4px"],", ",["code",{},"150ms"],", ",["code",{},"1.125rem"]]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"right"},"Atoms"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Semantic units; the smallest reusable system primitives"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Design tokens (color.primary, space.2, radius.sm); styles"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Utility classes and CSS variables; tailwind tokens"],["td",{"align":"left"},["code",{},"bg-primary-600"],", ",["code",{},"p-2"],", ",["code",{},"rounded-sm"],", ",["code",{},"--color-primary-600"]]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"right"},"Molecules"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Small, self-contained UI primitives built from atoms"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Figma components w/ variants"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Vue components using tokens/utilities"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Button, Input, Tag, Avatar"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"right"},"Cells"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Functional units with state/layout responsibility"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Compound components; slot-based in Figma"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Components that wrap logic + layout of molecules"],["td",{"align":"left"},"FormField (Label+Input+Help), Card, SearchField"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"right"},"Organs"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Feature-level assemblies"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Complex sections with content structure"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Feature modules/sections composed of cells"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Navbar, Sidebar, DataTable, FilterPanel"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"right"},"Organisms"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Page-level assemblies with data and routing context"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Full page templates/frames with content placeholders"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Route-backed views with fetching, guards, and layout"],["td",{"align":"left"},"DashboardPage, ProductDetailPage"]],["tr",{},["td",{"align":"right"},"Community"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Cross-product or multi-app ecosystem"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Libraries, design kits, documentation, governance"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Shared packages, storybook/docs, design tokens pipeline, CI"],["td",{"align":"left"},"Design system repo, multi-brand theming"]]]],["p",{},"Notes:"],["ul",{},["li",{},"The term “community” emphasizes that design systems live across teams,\nproducts, and brands. It is the governance and distribution layer."],["li",{},"Per your guidance: Atoms map to design tokens in Figma and utility classes in\ncode. Particles are the raw values beneath those tokens."]],["hr",{}],["h2",{"id":"from-science-to-system"},"From science to system"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Particles → values: Like electrons or quarks, they are not useful alone in\neveryday modeling. In systems, they’re literal values: hex codes, spacing\nnumbers, durations."],["li",{},"Atoms → tokens/utilities: Named semantic building blocks that carry meaning\n(primary, success, space.2) and are the only allowed way to encode visual\ndecisions in components."],["li",{},"Molecules → primitives: Combine atoms to create the smallest meaningful UI\ncomponents."],["li",{},"Cells → functional units: Provide behavioral glue (state, layout, validation)\nand compose molecules into form controls or presentational units."],["li",{},"Organs → sections/features: Larger groupings with domain purpose."],["li",{},"Organisms → page-level compositions with data and routing context."],["li",{},"Community → distribution & governance: Documentation, package publishing,\nrelease policy, and brand/theme management."]],["h2",{"id":"figma-mapping-and-practices"},"Figma mapping and practices"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Particles\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Store as raw values in token management (e.g., Figma Tokens/Variables)."],["li",{},"Do not reference particles directly in components."]]],["li",{},"Atoms\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Create token sets: color, typography, space, radius, shadow, motion."],["li",{},"Name semantically (e.g., color.bg.default, color.accent.primary)."],["li",{},"Use variables on component properties and styles."]]],["li",{},"Molecules\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Build base components (Button, Input, Tag) using tokens only."],["li",{},"Provide variants for size, emphasis, state. No hard-coded values."]]],["li",{},"Cells\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Compose primitives into meaningful controls (e.g., FormField: Label + Input\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Help + Error). Define spacing/layout via tokens."]]]]],["li",{},"Organs\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Section-level components (Navbar, Sidebar, DataTable). Support slots/regions\nand responsive behavior via constraints."]]],["li",{},"Organisms\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Page frames. Wire up content placeholders, not hard-coded content."]]],["li",{},"Community\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Publish as a library file. Maintain a tokens file per brand. Document\ncontribution guidelines and review checks."]]]],["h2",{"id":"code-mapping-and-practices-nuxt-3-vue-tailwind"},"Code mapping and practices (Nuxt 3 + Vue + Tailwind)"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Particles (values)\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Keep in a single source of truth (e.g., tokens JSON or tailwind theme)."],["li",{},"Emit CSS custom properties at ",["root",{}]," (for runtime theming)."]]]],["pre",{"className":"language-css shiki shiki-themes material-theme-palenight","code":":root {\n  --color-primary-600: #3b82f6; /* particle value */\n  --space-2: 0.5rem;\n  --radius-sm: 0.25rem;\n  --motion-fast: 150ms;\n}\n","language":"css","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sJ14y"},"root"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"  --color-primary-600"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," #"],["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"3b82f6"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},";"],["span",{"class":"saEQR"}," /* particle value */\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"}," --radius-sm"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sx098"}," 0.25rem"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},";\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"  --motion-fast"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sx098"}," 150ms"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},";\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"}\n"]]]],["ul",{},["li",{},"Atoms (tokens/utilities)\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"In Tailwind, expose semantic tokens via theme extensions and/or CSS vars."],["li",{},"Consume atoms via utilities, not literal values."]]]],["pre",{"className":"language-js shiki shiki-themes material-theme-palenight","code":"// tailwind.config.js\nexport default {\n  theme: {\n    extend: {\n      colors: {\n        primary: {\n          600: ''rgb(var(--color-primary-600) / <alpha-value>)'',\n        },\n      },\n      spacing: {\n        2: ''var(--space-2)''\n      },\n      borderRadius: {\n        sm: ''var(--radius-sm)''\n      },\n    }\n  }\n}\n","language":"js","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"saEQR"},"// {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"  theme"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"sx098"},"          600"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," 2"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},":"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," },\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":16},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"    }\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":17},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"  }\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":18},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"}\n"]]]],["ul",{},["li",{},"Molecules (UI primitives)"]],["pre",{"className":"language-vue shiki shiki-themes material-theme-palenight","code":"<!-- components/ui/Button.vue -->\n<template>\n  <button\n    :class=\"[\n      ''inline-flex items-center gap-2 font-medium transition-colors'',\n      sizeClass,\n      variantClass,\n      disabled ? ''opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed'' : ''hover:brightness-110'',\n    ]\"\n    :disabled=\"disabled\"\n  >\n    <slot />\n  </button>\n</template>\n\n<script setup lang=\"ts\">\ninterface Props {\n  variant?: ''primary'' | ''secondary''\n  size?: ''sm'' | ''md''\n  disabled?: boolean\n}\nconst props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {\n  variant: ''primary'',\n  size: ''md'',\n  disabled: false\n})\n\nconst sizeClass = computed(() =>\n  props.size === ''sm'' ? ''px-3 py-1.5 text-sm rounded-sm'' : ''px-4 py-2 text-sm rounded-sm''\n)\nconst variantClass = computed(() =>\n  props.variant === ''primary'' ? ''text-white bg-primary-600'' : ''text-primary-600 bg-white border''\n)\n</script>\n","language":"vue","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"saEQR"},"<!-- components/ui/Button.vue -->\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"<"],["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"template"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},">\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"  <"],["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"button\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"    :"],["span",{"class":"sJ14y"},"class"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"="],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"\""],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"[\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"      ''"],["span",{"class":"sfyAc"},"inline-flex items-center gap-2 font-medium transition-colors"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"''"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},",\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"      sizeClass"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},",\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"      variantClass"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},",\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"      disabled"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," ? "],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"''"],["span",{"class":"sfyAc"},"opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"''"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," : "],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"''"],["span",{"class":"sfyAc"},"hover:brightness-110"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"''"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},",\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":9},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"    ]"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"\"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":10},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"    :"],["span",{"class":"sJ14y"},"disabled"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"="],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"\""],["span",{"class":"s0W1g"},"disabled"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"\"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":11},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"  >\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":12},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"    <"],["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"slot"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," />\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":13},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"  </"],["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"button"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},">\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":14},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"</"],["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"template"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},">\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":15},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":16},["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"<"],["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"script"],["span",{"class":"sJ14y"}," setup"],["span",{"class":"sJ14y"}," lang"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"="],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"\""],["span",{"class":"sfyAc"},"ts"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"\""],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},">\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":17},["span",{"class":"sJ14y"},"interface"],["span",{"class":"s5Dmg"}," Props"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":18},["span",{"class":"s-wAU"},"  variant"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"?:"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," ''"],["span",{"class":"sfyAc"},"primary"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"},"''"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," |"],["span",{"class":"sAklC"}," await"],["span",{"class":"sdLwU"}," (distribution & governance)\n",["ul",{},["li",{},"Package the UI library (atoms→cells) as a workspace package."],["li",{},"Publish tokens as JSON and CSS variables. Generate typings."],["li",{},"Provide Storybook/Nuxt Storybook and docs. Enforce checks in CI."]]]],["h2",{"id":"practical-examples-end-to-end"},"Practical examples end-to-end"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Button (Molecule) in a Form (Cell) inside a Navbar (Organ) in a Dashboard\n(Organism)\n",["ol",{},["li",{},"Particles: ",["code",{},"#3b82f6"],", ",["code",{},"0.5rem"],", ",["code",{},"150ms"]],["li",{},"Atoms: ",["code",{},"primary.600"],", ",["code",{},"space.2"],", ",["code",{},"radius.sm"]],["li",{},"Molecule: ",["code",{},"<Button variant=\"primary\" size=\"sm\" />"]],["li",{},"Cell: ",["code",{},"<FormField hint=\\\"Email used for login\\\"><Input /></FormField>"]],["li",{},"Organ: ",["code",{},"<Navbar><template #actions><Button>Save</Button></template></Navbar>"]],["li",{},"Organism: ",["code",{},"<DashboardPage />"]," route that composes the organ(s) and cells"]]]],["h2",{"id":"migration-from-atomic-design"},"Migration from Atomic Design"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Map current “atoms” (often primitive components) to Molecules."],["li",{},"Introduce Atoms as tokens/utilities. Replace literal values with atoms."],["li",{},"Identify Cell boundaries where logic/layout glue exists."],["li",{},"Keep existing “organisms,” but split content-free sections as Organs and\nroute/data-aware pages as Organisms."],["li",{},"Create a Community layer: documentation site, tokens pipeline, versioning."]],["h2",{"id":"governance-and-versioning"},"Governance and versioning"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Particles/Atoms: versioned per theme/brand; changes require system-wide audit."],["li",{},"Molecules/Cells: semver minor for new variants, major for breaking changes."],["li",{},"Organs/Organisms: owned by feature teams; follow app-level release cadence."],["li",{},"Community: owns contribution guide, lint rules, checks for token-only usage in\nUI components, and documentation."]],["h2",{"id":"tldr"},"TL;DR"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Replace “templates/pages” with a biologically consistent spectrum that maps to\nreal team boundaries and artifacts."],["li",{},"Atoms are design tokens in Figma and utility classes in code."],["li",{},"Particles are the raw values beneath those tokens and should not be used\ndirectly."],["li",{},"Cells, Organs, and Organisms clarify the middle and upper tiers where atomic\ndesign is vague."]],["style",{},"html pre.shiki code .sAklC, html code.shiki .sAklC{--shiki-default:#89DDFF}html pre.shiki code .sJ14y, html code.shiki .sJ14y{--shiki-default:#C792EA}html pre.shiki code .s0W1g, html code.shiki .s0W1g{--shiki-default:#BABED8}html pre.shiki code .saEQR, html code.shiki .saEQR{--shiki-default:#676E95;--shiki-default-font-style:italic}html pre.shiki code .sx098, html code.shiki .sx098{--shiki-default:#F78C6C}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html pre.shiki code .s6cf3, html code.shiki .s6cf3{--shiki-default:#89DDFF;--shiki-default-font-style:italic}html pre.shiki code .s-wAU, html code.shiki .s-wAU{--shiki-default:#F07178}html pre.shiki code .sfyAc, html code.shiki .sfyAc{--shiki-default:#C3E88D}html pre.shiki code .s5Dmg, html code.shiki .s5Dmg{--shiki-default:#FFCB6B}html pre.shiki code .sdLwU, html code.shiki .sdLwU{--shiki-default:#82AAFF}html pre.shiki code .sbqyR, html code.shiki .sbqyR{--shiki-default:#FF9CAC}"]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":2,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"sub-atomic-design-system","depth":2,"text":"Sub-atomic design system"},{"id":"why-the-original-hierarchy-breaks-down","depth":2,"text":"Why the original hierarchy breaks down"},{"id":"the-sub-atomic-model-at-a-glance","depth":2,"text":"The Sub-Atomic model at a glance"},{"id":"from-science-to-system","depth":2,"text":"From science to system"},{"id":"figma-mapping-and-practices","depth":2,"text":"Figma mapping and practices"},{"id":"code-mapping-and-practices-nuxt-3-vue-tailwind","depth":2,"text":"Code mapping and practices (Nuxt 3 + Vue + Tailwind)"},{"id":"practical-examples-end-to-end","depth":2,"text":"Practical examples end-to-end"},{"id":"migration-from-atomic-design","depth":2,"text":"Migration from Atomic Design"},{"id":"governance-and-versioning","depth":2,"text":"Governance and versioning"},{"id":"tldr","depth":2,"text":"TL;DR"}]}}', 'Critique of atomic design and a new sub-atomic model mapping science to Figma and code with concrete examples.', 'md', '{"order":3}', 'true', '/docs/design-philosophy', '{"title":"Design philosophy","description":"Critique of atomic design and a new sub-atomic model mapping science to Figma and code with concrete examples."}', 'docs/design-philosophy', 'uhJMluQNEtDqGbfnwcG7CwevVLlxybfD5nGsB8Ul4j0'); -- uhJMluQNEtDqGbfnwcG7CwevVLlxybfD5nGsB8Ul4j0
